name: Ballz Triple Match
description:
Perfect mixer of Match 3 and TILE games.

When three or more number of tiles join, they merge into new one. Same as, when three or more balls are join, they turn into new one.

Join the numbers and get to the highest number tile!

Game features:

  • Easy to play but challenging to master
  • Endless challenge!
  • Get leafs to use amazing match 3 powers!
  • Use power to make smart moves
  • Compete against the world to establish the highest score!

The game is composing variety of things continuous.
